article_title: Older Nurses To Obamacare's Rescue, Boost Accountable Care

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Registered nurses are delaying retirement, a work decision that will help make new accountable care models and the move away from fee-for-service medicine more achievable under the Affordable Care Act. The decisions by nurses to continue working well into their late 60s and longer than they have in the past is [...]
